mapper.insert: INSERT INTO server_info_history ( ip, cpu, memory, disk, max_allowed_threads, online, used_cpu, used_memory, used_disk, current_threads, record_time ) VALUES (#{IP},#{CPU},#{memory},#{disk},#{maxAllowedThreads},#{online},#{usedCPU}, #{usedMemory},#{usedDisk},#{currentThreads},#{recordTime})
